This is where the solid design of the Miele comes in handy because I could easily use the attachments and the vacuum didn't budge. It didn't tip over or wobble or anything.Our family members have difficulty breathing, including one asthmatic. Miele calls it the AirClean sealed system, made up of 1) an AirClean Filter Bag and 2) a HEPA filter that catches 99.9+% of dirt, dust and allergens. That is amazing.  And when you physically see these two filters, you will be impressed with the high quality of the materials used and how well they keep the air clean while you're vacuuming.How cool is it that the suction adjusts to what's needed, depending on the floor?  And I love the little tech panel, too.After trying a cordless lightweight vacuum that flopped over too easily and didn't give me enough hose to use the attachments,  I am thrilled that the Miele has a super long cord.  I can plug it in and vacuum almost the whole house from one outlet. I like the convenience of just wrapping the cord around the 2 clips onthe base.This vacuum was exceptional,  and I'm happy to recommend it.  I hope this helped you to make a decision. Thank you for reading my review.

Wow.  The first thing you notice when you bite into a SweeTarts Soft & Chewy rope is that the exterior is like a soft licorice-type texture. It's the perfect amount of sweetness and the texture is quite enjoyable.About the 3rd chew into it, the tart cherry/fruit punch filling hits your tongue and, if you're like me, scrunches up your face from the tartness.Memories of the same "sweetness then tartness" of original SweeTarts came back to me with a smile. It's been years since I had SweeTarts, and I quite enjoyed this rendition of them.They were also a hit with the kids.  By the way,  there are 4 "ropes" in each package,  and they are nice-sized, so splitting a package is definitely an option.  A little of these go a long way because of how it wakes up your taste buds.Definitely a hit in our house.

This is incredibly solid and well-made, unlike some of the flimsy , unstable trimmers I've thrown money away on over the years.  It seems silly to emphasize that the battery compartment closes snugly and stays closed, but I've found you can't always assume that will be the case.The trimmer did a great job gently around the inside of the nostrils, without pulling or scratching.But the real test for me was trimming above the eyebrows,  to leave a nice clean line.  It's super risky to use a trimmer here because one little slip and you're done for, but with steady hands and this high quality Philips Norelco trimmer,  my eyebrows looked fantastic. I didn't use the eyebrow attachment that you can use to keep them the same length because I don't have a problem there, but it's definitely a nice addition to the set, along with a cover for the tip of the trimmer.Lastly, it's an awesome feature that you can run water over the tip, but I prefer to use a little alcohol square on the end to disinfect it.  I keep those little packaged alcohol squares around, along with baby wipes, for keeping everything from tweezer tips to the handle of my makeup case clean.Thank you for reading my review.  I hope it helps someone decide. I've purchased dozens of trimmers over the years, for myself and for family members.  I have to say that this trimmer leads the pack, and I'm really pleased with it.

Tweezerman is a great line, and these pointy, precise tweezers are my favorite Tweezerman product.  You may think they are pricey, and yeah, you're right,  but how many cheap tweezers have you bought over the years that didn't work out?  You know, when you grab the hair with the tweezers, pull, and the tweezers just slide along the hair,  not pulling it out at all.  Frustrated,  you attempt it again, with the same results. It makes the whole tweezing experience frustrating and worse,  your eyebrows look terrible.I finally had enough of that about 10 years ago and bought a nice pair of Tweezerman tweezers exactly like these ones.I wouldn't have had to replace them except that I've lost a few when my girlfriends see them and like them so much that I end up giving them away and ordering new ones.You are worth it, so spend a little bit on some high quality Tweezerman tweezers like these. You'll love them.

This router kicks butt!!!  I love the fact that I can prioritize each device, so my tablet and the PS4 get priority over everything else.  And I can change the priorities anytime I want from the app on my smartphone!!!  I absolutely love it.  I love the increased speed, too. (from my previous setup).It was super easy to set up.  It came with everything I needed, and took just 5 minutes to hook everything up, then another 10 minutes going through the app on the smartphone and the program on the PC.  Very user-friendly, and we are absolutely thrilled with it.

I'm doing a review now because I'm ordering a second pair, and thought it might help someone to know that my original purchase has lasted 3 years, with no complaints or problems.They have held up really well.  They are easy to hold, and the grip is very comfortable.I've used them for many different purposes in the household, but several months ago I put them by the front door, on Amazon package duty, and they work really well for opening packages.

We are a family of gamers and I was really excited to get our first gaming keyboard.  Whew.  It was not difficult to set up, but it's definitely going to take awhile to get the hang of it and be able to use the extensive features it offers.  So far it is definitely speeding up our gaming, because of the keystrokes we can cut by building the steps into macros.  The lights help tremendously with my young son because we can highlight the keys he needs for his particular games.  (it's hard for him to keep track of the keys sometimes).It is definitely top of the line, great quality, with all the bells and whistles.  Our experience has been positive so far, with no problems.  I called Customer Service twice with questions, and they were patient and thorough in their assistance.  We're thrilled with this incredible keyboard, and once we get more experience from it, I'll be back to update this.

This is our third year of getting the Just Dance game for the Wii, and we absolutely love it.  It's such an easy way to be active and have fun at the same time.  There is enough variety in the songs that anyone in the family can find a tune they like.If one of us just puts it on and cranks it up, it usually draws a couple other family members into the living room to dance!  And since we live in a cold weather state, we really need to be able to stay active to battle the "winter weight" that comes from being stuck inside and having less activity.  Ummm, OK, plus the holidays of extra eating and well, more "grazing" all winter long.Our family highly recommends this fun way to stay in shape.  Hope this helps someone decide.
Need these for a diabetes monitor, so they are obviously very important. Love the Energizer brand, and have been using them for years with great results.  Highly recommend them.

My little Minecraft fan loves this Creeper shirt.  The Creeper glows really bright after you put it under a light, or shine a flashlight on it.  He loves the glow in the dark factor, but honestly, even if it didn't, he'd still love it.  It's the nice simple Creeper head, on a good quality shirt, that washed really well, and fits great.

Since the moment I first found out I was pregnant years ago, I have been unable to think of Mother Mary without heart-wrenching tears.  Becoming a mother changes so many things, but having the heart of a mother and imagining the gut-wrenching pain that Mary not only endured, but endured with GRACE, is overwhelming.  The example that she set so long ago has moved so many of us to try harder, to be stronger, to live with grace and dignity, to love more purely, to have more faith...I pray to be the slightest bit as strong and good as she was.That being said, it was painful but inspiring to read Adam Hamilton's book, seeing Jesus' life through his mother's eyes.  Obviously it's not new information, and many have already contemplated Mary's perspective.  But starting from the crucifixion and then moving back to the beginning, with the author's insightful way of relating the story, emphasized how equally heart-breaking and faith-making Mary's journey was, and in this telling we are in the front row watching, feeling, and weeping.I loved this book, and I've already bought copies for my mother and a few friends.  It has inspired me to make my own journey count even more, and to work harder on who I am.  I'm pleased and honored to recommend it.

I like when a book makes me think.  I like when a book makes me think about things in a new or different way, or makes me want to learn more about something, or makes a difference in my life.  There are so many good outcomes to reading a book, especially one about such a powerful topic as "Entangled in Darkness:  Seeking the Light."  Since everyone has inner struggles, certainly a book like this from a best-selling author should give me some clear guidance.I am confused.While there are so many thought-provoking and heart-touching things in this book that I would still recommend it, I am confused.  The author's personal story is interesting and contains many messages, but I think she referred to her own story way too many times throughout this modest-sized book.  We get it, don't beat us over the head with it.I also get it that drawing from many different religions and practices can teach us a lot and help us even more, but again, I am confused.  Some of her comments, like her reactions to the afflictions of some of the people she met, kind of bothered me, because she seemed to shy away from, or be disturbed by, some of the people and their problems.  I guess I should applaud her honesty, but I felt bad for the people that she drew back from.I'm interested in many of the things she brought up, and I'm actually curious enough that I plan on reading her earlier books, "Be Your Own Shaman: Heal Yourself and Others with 21st-Century Energy Medicine" and "Truth Heals:  What You Hide Can Hurt You."  With a family that has a lot of medical problems to deal with, it is often frustrating to deal with more and more medical professionals and more and more prescriptions.  Although it is necessary to pursue the official medical path, I am intrigued by Deborah King's experiences and insights, and I really want to see what else she has to say that might lead us to the path of healing that we desperately want and need.I hope this has helped someone.  I definitely would recommend it.

I am a chocoholic, and love trying different kinds of chocolate.  For starters, this is nice-looking gift bag, with the different color foil-wrapped truffles and the cute little chocolate-colored bow around the cellophane bag top.  Instead of making you guess what flavor you're about to eat, Seattle Chocolates idiot-proofs that part by printing the flavor on the foil of each piece, and the back label shows a picture of each flavor, with the name next to it.  There were a total of 51 pieces in the one pound package, with about 3-4 of each flavor listed on the back label. (see above product description for the individual flavors).  I think that making sure you know what flavor you're about to eat is a nice touch on the part of Seattle Chocolates.Flavor-wise, these are tasty, but they didn't knock our socks off.  Some of them have a cream center, like the strawberry, with the chocolate covering, and some have the flavor mixed in with the chocolate, like the mint ones.  Some are dark chocolate and some are milk chocolate.My taste runs more along the lines of Ghirardelli, so the Seattle Chocolates were good, but not "eyes rolling back in the head while the world stops for a moment" delicious.  I hate to say that, but I have to be honest in my reviews and that "wow factor" was just not there.That being said, I gave some to a cousin that just loves the waxy Hershey bars (ahem, I love an occasional Hershey bar myself, just saying there are different levels of quality when it comes to chocolate.)  Anyway, my cousin thought these Seattle Chocolates were a slice of heaven, and asked me to order more for her.  So I think it depends on your preference for chocolate as to if these are going to do it for you or not.  I hope this helps give you an idea of what to expect.

We are so unbelievably impressed and pleased with our new Diono car seat, which we use as a booster seat for our 10-year-old.  Even though his previous car seat was safe and comfortable, after 7 years use, we felt safer getting a new one.  After TONS of research, we had decided on a Diono, and it seemed like the perfect choice when we had the opportunity to evaluate this one.Yes, it's heavy, but we keep it in the same vehicle, so that's not a problem for us.  It was easy to install.  We like that it's stainless steel, heavy, solid, durable, and so safe.  In our research, we thoroughly read the safety information on the us.diono.com website, and felt more and more sure that this was our safest option for our child.Due to frequent, long car trips back and forth to a hospital, comfort is very important, and after some use, I can tell you that this car seat does not disappoint.  It is very comfortable for him, and the sides are not just a good safety feature for side impact crashes, but very comfortable for him to lean against on the long hospital trip days..Very pleased to recommend.  Hope this review helps someone.

I have been looking for these for years.  I still have a few of the ones I bought years and years ago, but haven't been able to find them.  I just figured they were a relic of the past, and then I stumbled across them on Amazon.  I keep one in the shower, so after conditioning I can put my hair up while the conditioner does its thing.  I keep a few with my other hair products, in case I want to clip it in place till the gel or whatever product of the moment kicks in.  I keep a couple around for working out, to get my hair out of the way.  I keep a couple by my bedside, in case it's a warm night and I want it up.  These are so incredibly handy.  I love them, they work great.  The only way I've had them break is if someone steps on them!  They won't just crack or snap or anything.  I bought two packs of them, so that should last me a lifetime!

I bought two of these, and I regret both purchases.  The first one worked for awhile, then died.  Thinking it was a fluke, I bought another one, and it wouldn't work from the very beginning.  Very disappointing, and I definitely don't recommend.I'm sure if I'd pursued it, Amazon would have replaced them, but I didn't keep the packaging in either case and just couldn't follow up on it.  But I have to emphasize that these were poorly made and I wouldn't recommend them at all.

To an extent, t-shirts are t-shirts, right?  Well, one big complaint is when we have designs on shirts and the decals get real stiff and are hot and uncomfortable to wear.  This Minecraft design shirt is fantastic because the decal stays smooth, flat, and comfy, even after many washes.  It stays readable.  And the cotton is comfortable.I actually ordered this by mistake.  My little boy really wanted it, and I ordered the X-Large . When it arrived, we realized it was Men's not Boy's.  But they don't make this particular design in Boy's, so we decided it would be a great sleep-shirt.He loves it, and it has stayed vivid and comfortable.  Great, well-made shirt.

Sometimes you need to go old-school to feel confident that you've gotten rid of a threat to your family's health.  Recently we had company that had neglected to mention they were passing around a "bug."  Well, two members of our family are high risk for infection, so that was not great news for us.  Thankfully, we always keep Lysol spray on hand and as soon as they left we tackled the bathroom they used and the other common areas that they had been, including door knobs, chair rails, etc.  Of course, we opened a couple windows to both move some clean air through the house, and also to make sure we had adequate ventilation while using the Lysol spray.Yes, there are lots of great cleaning products out there that do a great job.  But I can't imagine any of them making me feel safe enough and confident enough as Lysol has made me feel for my lifetime, and growing up watching my mother use it, and my grandmother, too.

First, let me say that I have used Norton products for years and have been extremely satisfied with them, which is why the 3-star rating.Unfortunately, despite numerous attempts, I have been unable to get it to accept the Product Key so I can use it and fairly evaluate it.  I will continue to try, and will continue to get through to Customer Support to get assistance.  For some reason, it's a weird vicious circle of of needing to be registered to get through to chat to someone, and not being able to register because of the product key not being accepted.Once I am able to get it all to function, I'll update the review.

These brownies are delicious!  We usually make the Ghirardelli brownies, and they are heavenly, so I wasn't sure if these Immaculate Baking Brownies would be as good.  WOW.  They are sensational.The taste is a bit lighter chocolate, more of a cocoa type flavor, whereas Ghirardelli is more fudgy.  Both are equally delicious.  The advantages of having no high fructose corn syrup and healthier ingredients (including organic cocoa) sounded good till I saw that you have to use a whole stick of butter!  I thought that was kind of funny, but I think the idea isn't to make healthy brownies, but to just make them not-as-unhealthy as other brownies.We didn't even make icing because the taste was so flavorful.  We're pretty excited to try out some of the other Immaculate Baking products now that we've discovered them.  We'd highly recommend them.

It is easy to have faith when things are going well.  It is much harder to hang on and persevere when you are being bombarded with one challenge after another, when people are bailing on you left and right, when medical problems hit you or your family, when financial troubles are overwhelming, and more and more and more....Often you find yourself remembering how great it felt being surrounded by family and friends, feeling cared about and never imagining that these people would vanish, one at a time, as your life became more difficult.This book by Priscilla Shirer was so incredibly comforting, reminding us at every time .  Even though my faith has always been strong, "God is Able" gave me so many concrete reminders as to why it's OK to keep giving our problems to God.  "God is Able" to handle them, and wants us to just let go and allow Him to take care of us.  This book reminds us, through Scripture, of God's promises to us, and how we need to just get out of His way and let him help us.

Absolutely love it!  We've been using it for a few weeks now, and can't believe how much of a difference this coffeemaker has made for us.For years we used the carafe kind, which scotches the coffee if you leave it on the warmer too long.  You know, it gets bitter the longer it's on there, and who wants it burned tasting?  Then we switched to K-cups, which got real expensive really fast, and inconvenient with more than a couple guests.This is probably our last switch in coffeemakers, because it is exactly what we need.  Of course it has lots of nice bells and whistles, such as the ability to program a preset on-time, so you can wake up to the wonderful smell of coffee brewing.  But the fact that it keeps it warm inside the coffeemaker, with an automatic 2 hour shutoff, is a key advantage for us, since we're just sippers, not gulpers.  Being able to make one cup at a time lets the whole family enjoy their morning cup of Joe at their leisure, without waiting too long and having it be scorched.It cleans up easily, and doesn't take up much room.  We just love it!

We gave these Ziploc bags a couple weeks of use before doing this review.  For the most part they are much like all the other Ziploc bags, a solid product that does what it's intended to.  We tested them against the regular size Ziploc sandwich bags.  They look the same, other than the size, but when you feel them, you can tell that these XL ones are the tiniest bit thinner.  That shouldn't matter, you say to yourself, but it seemed to matter at the corners, where we had several of them tear.  Granted, we were stretching them apart, exactly the same as we did with the regular size Ziploc sandwich bags, which did not tear at all.  How often are you in a situation where you are pulling your sandwich bags apart?  Right, practically never, except for a couple lunchbox trades that got a little heated.  We tried pointy chips like Doritos in them, and they didn't puncture at all.So overall, if used just temporarily for food, no problem.  If you plan on using them long-term, say to store stuff in around the house or garage, or in the car, like many of us do, I'd be careful because they puncture easier.For us, using them for pizza slices, they are great.  For any size sandwiches, they are great, and we particularly liked being able to put each child's sandwich AND their snack in one bag, instead of using 2 bags for each child.  And we like to get the foot long subs and cut them into thirds, so these larger bags were the perfect size for that, too.Four stars, great product. If they didn't tear at the corners on our testing, I'd have gone with 5 stars, but I've never had a Ziploc tear in years and years of use, so I had to dock it one star.

I have been happy with other VTech products, so I was surprised that this one did not work out very well for us.  We could not get the signal to stay connected for longer than 10-15 minutes.  And that was at a range of 80-100 feet, not the 1000 ft range it's supposed to have.There are some great features, like encryption so your neighbors aren't picking up your conversations through their own monitors, and the sound is decent, I guess.  But none of that matters if the connection won't stabilize.  Frustrating experience because I really wanted to like it, but it became impossible.I'd rather put more money into something as important as monitoring my baby/children, because there's no room for error.  So I'll say great company, but a swing and a miss for this particular product.

Falling apart after two months of indoor use as indoor shoes for school. Yes, I know they are inexpensive, but keep in mind that these shows are never worn out outdoor surfaces or playgrounds, so I did still expect them to hold up as slippers.

We have been trying different curly hair shampoos and conditioners for the past 6-8 months. My daughter has very curly hair, I have wavy. The shampoo is fine, but does nothing to help frizz or define curls. There are better shampoos and conditioners out there.
Great leggings, cute, run small, wash well.
Nice compact paint palette. Easy to clean.

My kids are using these are indoor shoes for school. We are only two months into school, and the soles are already worn out. Keep in mind that yes, they are wearing them 5 days a week, 5-6 hours a day, but also only indoors on carpet and tile, so not concrete or outdoor surfaces. Yes, I know these are inexpensive and I would kind of expect this is they were wearing them on playgrounds or outside in general. But they are not. So keep this in mind when ordering, these are a "temporary clothing" type of shoe.
Cute roll of stickers.
Cute item

Fantastic book. LOTS of information, I read it over the course of a few weeks, because it is so dense, and I really wanted to make sure I absorbed the info. The training makes sense and works. The author is also very helpful personally. I wrote to her with a few concerns and she took her time to write me an email back with great information and tips. Highly recommend.
Cute designs, sturdy collar, easy to wash as I just learned and dries out fast too.
Cute designs, sturdy leash, easy to wash as I just learned and dries out fast too.
Great value, easy to get into the ground. I used these to create a slip n slide.

Perfect for making a slip and slide! We have a nice hill, and I used approximately 30 loop garden stakes along the edges to secure it to the ground. We use a general lawn sprinkler sometimes, but most just a garden hose at the top. 10 feet is rather wide, so two people can race, but you need to use a sprinkler method so the water hits it all around better. A hose creates one nice stream for one person to slide down, and you go much faster with the extra water pooled down one stream. So far we mostly use it folded to aboud 5 feet wide, and it has held up great for a few weeks now, with almost daily use by my kids, their friends and even adults!
Cute illustrations, but the story is dreadful.
Very cute and actually stat in really well.

These are crocs, just as you expect. They are not meant to fit perfectly, and my kids love them. The glitter is a nice touch, it does wear off with scuffs however, but if my girls con't care, I dont care.

These are crocs, just as you expect. They are not meant to fit perfectly, and my kids love them. The glitter is a nice touch, it does wear off with scuffs however, but if my girls con't care, I dont care.
Love this brand of wine glass markers. Always get complements on them. I gave these and the flower version away as gifts recently.

My second pair of these grips. After 2 years on my bike, the other are so faded, they look like pale  pink whereas new these are a nice bubblegum pinkDoes not effect performance in any way, they are super comfy to grip onto. And I do not use my bike that often, just for rides with the kids maybe 10 times a year, and it is stored inside of a shed and not in the sun. It is hard to find pink grips for my bike, so I am ordering these again even though I do think after 2 years, they should not be so faded especially considering my bike usage. Hence the 4-star rating.
Super cute twist on the paper stray trend.

Has a very unique taste that I simply do not like. But I think the taste is something that people seeking a good Vietnamese coffee will appreciate, and I recognize this is just my personal preference.

Love these straws. My son has high functioning Autism; for whatever sensory reason he ALWAYS drinks with a straw; from glasses, cans, whatever. He loves these straws. I like them because they are reusable! Now, instead of going through 4-5 straws per day I have him choose ONE color for the day; he can rinse and reuse it all day long and I can pop it in the utensil section of the dishwasher at night.I was able to test and try this product at a discount during a promotional launch. I would not hesitate to recommend this product or buy it again at full price.

My son just received an Ipod 5 for his birthday, replacing his Ipod 4. This case is great; nice and inexpensive and seemingly durable.What I  like best is that it is open on the bottom. I was able to put a 40 pin to lightning adapter on his IHome; the Ipod fits perfectly on it with the case on . It is not a 'lifeproof' or 'otterbox' ....but it is just fine for our purposes.

This has been working well for my teenage son. Please note he does not have severe acne, he has mild pimples around his forehead and around his temple area; particularly around his hair line. I have bought him every cream, lotion, potion I can think of. It is not a matter of products not working..my son has to USE the products in order for them to work!For whatever reason my son has been using this wash. Perhaps because of the design of the bottle, the ease of use of the pump? It is in our shower on a shelf and he has been genuinely using it and I have see a decrease is the amount of pimples he has. It also seems whatever pimples he did have a drying out.I would certainly buy this product again if I continue to see the results I have been seeing. I was able to test and try this product at a promotional discount. I would not hesitate to pay full price for this when it it depleted.

Love this water bottle...perfect for my son for his sports activities. It goes into his bag flat; takes up almost no space at all. When he needs it after school he simply fills it & of he goes. He can also throw it or toss it on the floor ( as all kids do) and it won't break.It does not leak, and although he has already lost the top cover to the cap, it doesn't matter because the spout stays shut when you close it.I was given the opportunity to test this product during a promotional launch. I was very interested to try it. This summer we purchased a similar water bottle at a National park with a logo of the park on it. My son loves it and I was wondering if this bottle would work the same. We were not disappointed. I would recommend this product without hesitation.

It is very easy to sharpen knives, and the evidence is right on the counter...you can see shards of the knife that have been sharpened away.These sharpeners have given new life to the knives in my drawer. I was given the opportunity to test the PC knife sharpener during a promotional launch. Why is this my third?? One for my house, one for my mother in law, and this one for my camper! You can't go wrong with these.

I like this French press very much. Very durable, sleek design. I prefer to see what I am making ... So my preference is clear glass. That said, this does make great coffee.. Works just as it is described. Will more than likely keep this model in my camper. Works much faster than a typical camping percolator. *received at a discount for review*
